title: BArD
body:
Has anyone ever seen a good Bard player yet?
If so can you please tell me the summoner name, so i can spectate.
-thanks in advance

replies.body: what does janna swallow? I'm interested

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4TEo24ki,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-13T03:11:37.968+0000)
>
> Sona and Leona are better in everyway.

But they don't have a fricken MAGICAL JOURNEY!!!
Magical journey is all that matters
TLLT is supposed to be best bard OCE according to [lolskill ](http://www.lolskill.net/top/highest-lolskillscore?filterChampion=432&filterRealm=OCE)
